name: Presenting API design for review
description: Claude shows API design and asks for feedback - should STOP

transcript.content: Design the REST API for the task management feature

Here's the proposed API design:

- POST /tasks - Create task
- GET /tasks/:id - Get task
- PUT /tasks/:id - Update task  
- DELETE /tasks/:id - Delete task
- GET /tasks?status=active - List tasks

Does this API design work for your needs?
